Mini Announcement

I'm on vacation for another 2 weeks, I wont be able to get round to adding people to the whitelist as quickly as usual until I get home
please ask either: @Kepler68 / @RA3236 / @Shania_L / @ZooNamedGames (for a quicker response)to add you to the whitelist
 

=> Please remember to tell us your minecraft name
=> Forge + Installation Instructions are provided in our discord
=> Currently on Minecraft 1.11.2 until either forge 1.12 becomes more stable or minecraft fixes a small client sync bug
=> Tell your friends, everyone is welcome

Edited October 9, 2017 by SparkyFox

for those not on the discord (WHY ARENT YOU) 
i have the server modpack ready and up for testing in there. ill grab a link in a sec
it is NOT on the server yet
@Findthepin1 @SparkyFox is looking for you. run, run fast, run far, and dont look back

Just now, Kepler68 said:

@Findthepin1 @SparkyFox is looking for you. run, run fast, run far, and dont look back

Lol
I've updated the mini announcement with the modpack needed and a 3rd link to the discord. We had a problem on discord and a few people were lost, but please feel free to rejoin

Good day everyone, and Happy 2018! The server's undergone a lot over the last couple of months, and I feel like now's the time to finally showcase everythign that's happened (Just without pictures because I can't get those right now). Let's begin this improv tour of what's happened to the server, and the sights you might want to see.

 

Sanctuary:

 

Much in Sanctuary has changed- most of which I either don't know or can't remember due to this massive headache I seem to be having at the moment. First off, the Sanctuary Metro  has undergone some improvements. There was a weird glitch where the minecarts were hitting some invisible entity but Sparky and I fixed it. Also with the line, Jeremy added another one, going out to a mesa biome. Ask him for details on that one. About a month or 2 ago, we added Galacticraft, which added rockets, rovers, etc. Well, we've decided to use those rovers, just on Earth. And what do rovers need? Fuel! And where else to get that but Gas&Go, your #1 stop for fuel in Sanctuary! A perfect selection of convenience-store foods, drinks, affordable fuel, and friendly staff all combine to make G&G the best place to go for all your fuel needs! Around Sanctuary, the Rocket Garden's grown (According to the discord; I haven't been on the server since Sunday thanks to school), and, sadly, the dam has gone . #RIPDam You'll be forever missed. 

 

Paradise:

 

Not very much has recently happened in Paradise to speak of, but I'll try my best to give y'all a good-ish tour. Paradise Station hasn't changed much, except for the random gremlin stealing me ruddy fence posts on the arrival/departure area. KEEP YER PAWS OFF 'EM YOU BUGGERS. Down the road, I've taken the liberty of lighting up the roads, increasing visibility. On the Main Road, the IDS Center is still there, and someone added a sweet desert/mesa area area next to it. Across from the desert place is City Hall, where Sparky is currently mayor/supreme ruler over us all that we all love with adoration and affection. Also down the road, I have bought the big unnamed blue tower, which is now the Enterprise Tower, which is home to the server's first (And I think only) redstone elevator! (Thanks Zentro.) Around paradise, I've built a large race track (Like seriously, it's massive) that circles around almost all of Paradise, and looks pretty darn cool imo. It's got a tunnel, a Stadium, and its very own podium! Check it out sometime.

We've also got our own resturaunt chain; Grillby's! It's got plenty of food on the menu, with burgers, fries, fish sandwiches, and much, must more. Behind the main Grillby's in Paradise is a special creation I worked on all by myself. A small private airport/jet thing. It's got a parking lot, a runway (Albeit a short runway), and its own plane! Note: The airport's meant to be used only by "employees" of the Sparkean Space Agency; a space agency with its own space center. It is also open to "employees" of WOC (Pronounced "wawk"), or World-Wide Oil Corperation, a company dedicated to the collection and refining of oil to be used in fuel. PM me if you want to know more.

 

This is all that I've got the time, energy, and health to type, as my headache has gone down to my stomach. Joy... Remember: Me typing this up isn't anything CLOSE to the real thing! There's so much more you can see, do, and interact with on the server! Pop in sometime. We'd love to have you!
@SparkyFox@DarkOwl57 could I join it I am not to late my name is creeperkid091

8 hours ago, Elon Kerman Jr said:

@SparkyFox@DarkOwl57 could I join it I am not to late my name is creeperkid091

You can join, all are welcome

So it's May, about five months since my last post on the server. It's been a while, hasn't it? Time to check in.

 

Sanctuary

Nothing much has changed, actually. There's a new addition to the Rocket Garden in the form of one that we can't even see because of the clouds. Check it out if you want. Uh... What else... OH! Soon (and I'm talking like within the week), we'll have sports arenas in Paradise, Sarim, Sanctuary, Paradise Valley, a tiny village, and Wilderness! These areas will play host to Baseball, Basketball, Archery, and Rover Tracks. These areas are all meant to be part of the USA (United Sporting Association- 100% unintended acronym), which I hope you'll take part in. Besides that, there's nothing much. Sanctuary's not changed much- still the charming, happy city/town we all know and love.

 

Paradise

Various changes have gone on here, but not at the same time. The most significant difference (at least for me) isn't even visible from the sky. To go with the theme of towers, I've constructed a vast underground parking garage. With two lots (possibly 3, depending on how much free time I get), the lots can hold multiple rovers (cars) if you wish. (Also, to the person with the tower that was being constructed half-underground, Apologies to you. I may have used the clay frame to form the border for Lot B... And the stone slabs... Sorry 

I do hope all of you will take part in our nice little server- we'd love to have you. Until we see you on the server or the discord, we'll see you soon!

Announcement

We're updating to Vanilla Minecraft 1.13 and starting a new world for now, while we convert a copy of the original world to 1.13.
Anything built on the 1.13 save will be merged onto our original world once it's converted.

please ask either: @Kepler68 / @Shania_L / @ZooNamedGames (for a quicker response)to add you to the whitelist
or join our discord server (for an even quicker response) and ask our discord moderators to add you to the whitelist.

=> Please remember to tell us your minecraft name
=> Tell your friends, everyone is welcome
=> We have other activates and games other than minecraft
